algorithms.name: obtain an expanded URL
algorithms.html: To <dfn id="dfn-obtain-an-expanded-url" tabindex="0" aria-haspopup="dialog" data-dfn-type="dfn">obtain an expanded URL</dfn>, apply the following steps:

steps.html:
Let baseURL, expandedURL, prefix, and reference be empty strings.

Explanation

In this algorithm:

  • baseURL will hold the base URL associated with the value, whether this URL is assigned in a prefix attribute, corresponds to a default vocabulary, or comes from a reserved prefix.
  • expandedURL will hold the final URL that results from the concatenation of the base URL and reference.
  • prefix will hold the compact URL's prefix [epub-34] (i.e., the value before the colon). Properties from a default vocabulary will not have a prefix, but all others will.
  • reference will hold the compact URL's reference [epub-34] (i.e., the value after the prefix). All valid properties require a reference.
Obtain the values of <var>prefix</var> and <var>reference</var> as follows:

If value does not contain a colon (U+003A), set reference to value.

Explanation

If a compact URL value does not have a colon, it does not have a prefix. In this case, the value is drawn from the default vocabulary as described in the next step of the algorithm.

Otherwise, if value begins with a colon, the value is invalid. Return null.

Explanation

A colon at the beginning of the value is invalid as it indicates the prefix is not set.
Otherwise, split value on the first colon and set prefix to the string before the colon and set reference to the string after the colon.
Obtain the value of <var>baseURL</var> as follows:

If attr is epub:type [epub-34], set baseURL to
http://idpf.org/epub/vocab/structure/#
Otherwise, if elem is the package document meta element [epub-34] and attr is scheme, the property value is invalid. Return null.

Otherwise, if elem is the package document meta element [epub-34], set baseURL to
http://idpf.org/epub/vocab/package/meta/#

Otherwise, if elem is the package document link element [epub-34], set baseURL to
http://idpf.org/epub/vocab/package/link/#

Otherwise, if elem is the package document item element [epub-34], set baseURL to
http://idpf.org/epub/vocab/package/item/#

Otherwise, if elem is the package document itemref element [epub-34], set baseURL to
http://idpf.org/epub/vocab/package/itemref/#
If a prefix attribute is declared on the document element of doc, and the attribute contains a prefix that matches prefix, set baseURL to the URL associated with the prefix declaration.
Otherwise, if prefix matches a reserved prefix [epub-34] for doc, set baseURL to the URL associated with the reserved prefix.

Set <var>expandedURL</var> to the concatenated values of <var>baseURL</var> and
					<var>reference</var>. Do not add a separator when concatenating the values.

If expandedURL is not a valid URL string, the value is invalid. Return null.

Otherwise, return expandedURL.

Explanation

Although an expanded value might be obtained, it is not necessarily the case that it is a valid URL. This is only likely to occur when an invalid base URL is assigned to a prefix.
